template.template: Template UBNT UGW - UniFi Controller v5 - active checks
template.name: Template UBNT UGW - UniFi Controller v5 - active checks
template.description:
Template for UBNT UniFI Gateway by zbx.sadman@gmail.com
Tested with controller v5.x, Zabbix v 2.4.
https://github.com/zbx-sadman/unifi_proxy
Requirements: UniFi Proxy / UniFi Miner >= v1.3.5&
aptitude install libjson-perl libjson-xs-perl libwww-perl libio-socket-ssl-perl libdata-dumper-simple-perl libtime-hires-perl
aptitude bring a-lot-of-beer

item_prototype.name: [{#SITEDESC}] UGW "{#NAME}" LAN interface full duplex state
[{#SITEDESC}] UGW "{#NAME}" LAN network DHCP guard enabled
[{#SITEDESC}] UGW "{#NAME}" LAN network IGMP snooping enabled
[{#SITEDESC}] UGW "{#NAME}" state
[{#SITEDESC}] UGW "{#NAME}" WAN interface full duplex state
